name: Secret Delivery 2
description:
Deliver presents to all 6 houses without being caught by the very near-sighted kids. Some houses have multiple Christmas trees, if you get caught and you have to start the house again so plan your route carefully!

Part of my tradition to make a game every December. It took me 5 days past Christmas to release this one but I got it done.  May revisit this with updates and download-ables at a later time, so web version only for now.

Controls: 

  • Move: Arrow Keys
  • Place presents under tree: Space
  • Run (Only when outside): Left Shift
  • Mute music: M Key

FIREFOX USERS: The game may crash while starting, press 'r' on the title-screen to possibly prevent this. If you have cookies enabled a simple refresh after crashing will fix it automatically too.

Credits:

  • Music
    • Dee Yan-Key - santa on the ice
    • Jesse Spillane - Molten Snow
  • Made with LÖVE
  • Groverburger's 3D Engine (old version and modified)
  • love.js for the LÖVE web conversion
